Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Alamedamama
Reviews.Content: Wanted a really good camera for a long time but was afraid it would be too difficult to use. This is not only perfect, but came with a 2nd lens and LOTS of great additional pieces i.e., filters, 32GB SD card, camera bag, and so much more! If you are on the fence, I absolutely say try this product; you won't be sorry.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 32GB SDHC 300x Card +
<4> Spare LP-E12 Battery for Canon + <5> Battery Charger for LP-E12 + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <9> PD DSLR Sling Backpack + <10> HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Monitor Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 Digital SLR Camera & EF-S 18-55mm IS STM Lens with EF 75-300mm III Lens + 32GB Card + Battery + Backpack + Filters + Accessory Kit
